name: 4.4 "The Groom Wore Clearasil" Quiz | Television | 10 Questions

questions.text: What did Woody's parents plan to do with Woody's dog?
options: build him his own dog house
questions.explanation:
put him to sleep.

	Woody got a letter from his dog and he explained to Sam it was his mother who wrote the letter as if it were the dog. In the letter 'the dog' said that his mother was planning to have him put to sleep. Woody read that and immediately had to go call his mother.

questions.text: Why did the two men sit at Diane's station?
questions.correct: She gave them change that wasn't theirs.
options: That was just where they sat down.
questions.explanation:
She gave them change that wasn't theirs.

	Diane had just finishing telling Sam how good she was getting at her job. She dropped off drinks to one party of people, then on the way back she gave the two men at the table $20 saying it was their change.

Carla.

	Sam was really busy and tried to call Carla. However, her son Anthony was on the phone all day with his girlfriend.

questions.text: What did Cliff bring into the bar?
questions.correct: a potato that looked like Richard M. Nixon
options: a potato that looked like Donald Trump
a potato that had Bette Davis' eyes
a potato that looked like Cliff Clavin
questions.explanation:
a potato that looked like Richard M. Nixon

	Cliff said he grew the potato himself. Later on, Norm told Cliff he had gone off the deep end. Cliff explianed that he had been under a lot of stress.

Annie.

	Annie was played by Amanda Ingber. Anthony was played by Timothy Williams. Their characters in this episode were 16 years old.

questions.text: When did Sam say a man used the word love?
questions.correct: Tennis and after he's paid for the room.
options: When he wants to have sex with a woman
Only when he really means it
questions.explanation:
Tennis and after he's paid for the room.

	Anthony said that he and Annie were waiting to be married before having sex. Sam said there was something wrong with the youth today.

Sumner Sloan.

	Sumner Sloan was the man from the very first episode of "Cheers" that was supposed to marry Diane but left her to go back to his wife. Diane thought that because the recommendation came from him, that the man who gave her the interview wanted to sleep with her.

Anthony.

	Despite only being 16, he wanted to marry Annie. To do so he needed permission from his mother or his father. Carla was not too thrilled - okay, she hated the idea of her son getting married so young.

questions.text: How long did Carla tell her son to stay away from his girlfriend?
questions.explanation:
Two weeks.

	Carla figured that if her son didn't see his girlfriend for two weeks he would start to go after other women. Her theory was that Anthony was a Tortelli man and all Tortelli men were scum.

questions.text: What did Anthony and his girlfriend exchange?
questions.explanation:
chewing gum.

	Norm said that was unsanitary. Cliff said that chewing gum was the breeding ground for cooties.
